pages.text: The $(b)Flight Sigil$() grants the wielder the forbidden ability to tread upon the very air itself. Gravity is no longer a law, but a $(o)suggestion$().
While held, you gain the power of $(6)Celestial Flight$(). Like a god looking down upon the world, you can soar, hover, and drift through the skies exactly as you would in $(n)Creative Spirit$().
No wings, no rocketsâ€”just the sheer force of your $(4)ascended will$() pushing you through the clouds. The world is your playground, and the horizon is your only limit.
